# Predator's Cry (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Fear Spells|fear]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]], [[Sonic Spells|sonic]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** Up to one animal/level, no two of which are more than 60 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Forge of War (WotC), pg. 115

*You emit a terrifying bellow, the sound of which scrapes your throat raw but carries across the winds like the fiercest war cry or the howling of the wolf.*

Particularly effective against cavalry, this spell causes all affected animals to become [[Panicked|panicked]]. If a [[Panicked|panicked]] animal carries a rider, the rider must succeed on a DC 25 [[Ride (Skill)|Ride]] check to prevent the animal from trying to flee the battlefield. If the animal successfully saves, it is instead [[Shaken|shaken]] for the duration of the spell.
